医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
邻里暴力影响儿童大脑发育美国心理学会发表的研究表明，生活在暴力频繁的社区可能会改变大脑部分检测和应对潜在威胁的方式，从而影响儿童的发育，从而可能导致心理健康状况恶化和其他负面结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Neighborhood-violence-impacts-childrens-brain-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Neighborhood-violence-impacts-childrens-brain-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2daf79a-d595-479f-bcd9-b9d9161e844a Thu, 22 Feb 2024 11:54:21 -0500 Neighborhood violence impacts children's brain development
华大基因利用 DNBSEQ-G99 平台增强 NIFTY 产前检测试剂盒，以获得更快、更准确的结果华大基因全资子公司BGI Europe A/S宣布，其NIFTY无创产前检测试剂盒和软件（CE-IVDD List B）在其现有CE-IVDD认证下获得延期，包括DNBSEQ-G99型号以满足欧盟医疗器械法规的要求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/NIFTYc2ae-DNBSEQ-G99-Platform-Receives-CE-IVDD-Certification-And-Advances-Prenatal-Care-Standards.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/NIFTYc2ae-DNBSEQ-G99-Platform-Receives-CE-IVDD-Certification-And-Advances-Prenatal-Care-Standards.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=295a4bb4-fadd-428f-9b09-eb9b706cdac8 Thu, 22 Feb 2024 11:47:00 -0500 BGI Genomics enhances NIFTY prenatal testing kit with DNBSEQ-G99 platform for faster and accurate results
母亲在分娩期间使用抗生素会增加儿童患自身免疫性疾病的风险芬兰奥卢大学最近进行的一项涉及近 46,000 名儿童的登记研究显示，母亲在分娩时接受抗生素治疗的孩子比同龄人更容易患自身免疫性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Maternal-antibiotic-use-during-childbirth-tied-to-higher-risk-of-autoimmune-diseases-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Maternal-antibiotic-use-during-childbirth-tied-to-higher-risk-of-autoimmune-diseases-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09db9f70-3df2-4996-87d0-0ea1b30d4323 Thu, 22 Feb 2024 11:42:35 -0500 Maternal antibiotic use during childbirth tied to higher risk of autoimmune diseases in children
Delta阿片受体激动剂可减少小鼠的焦虑样行为与焦虑相关的疾病会对受影响个体的心理健康和生活质量产生深远的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Delta-opioid-receptor-agonist-reduces-anxiety-like-behavior-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Delta-opioid-receptor-agonist-reduces-anxiety-like-behavior-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=acd2c9a5-5e38-40a7-99b1-470e0b637e27 Thu, 22 Feb 2024 11:36:44 -0500 Delta opioid receptor agonist reduces anxiety-like behavior in mice
研究：早期先进治疗可显着改善克罗恩病的预后克罗恩病治疗策略的大规模临床试验表明，在诊断后立即为所有患者提供早期先进治疗可以大大改善结果，包括将需要紧急腹部手术治疗疾病的人数减少十倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Study-Early-advanced-therapy-significantly-improves-Crohns-disease-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Study-Early-advanced-therapy-significantly-improves-Crohns-disease-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dae8cbc3-3f27-4b08-95fe-d85ce2869ed7 Thu, 22 Feb 2024 11:30:00 -0500 Study: Early advanced therapy significantly improves Crohn's disease outcomes
重大发现提高了对与长新冠病毒相关的脑雾的理解今天，都柏林三一学院的科学家团队和 FutureNeuro 的研究人员宣布了一项重大发现，该发现对于我们理解一些长新冠病毒患者的脑雾和认知能力下降具有深远的意义。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Major-discovery-improves-the-understanding-of-brain-fog-linked-with-Long-COVID.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Major-discovery-improves-the-understanding-of-brain-fog-linked-with-Long-COVID.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b988eab-3801-4615-91ed-dea5e8309cef Thu, 22 Feb 2024 11:13:50 -0500 Major discovery improves the understanding of brain fog associated with Long COVID
研究揭示细胞膜损伤与细胞衰老之间的意外联系我们的细胞被一层脆弱的膜包围，该膜只有 5 纳米厚，只有肥皂泡的 1/20。细胞很容易因生理活动而受损，包括肌肉收缩和组织损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Study-reveals-unexpected-link- Between-cell-membrane-damage-and-cellular-senthesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Study-reveals-unexpected-link- Between-cell-membrane-damage-and-cellular-senthesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=722b8541-b563-41b5-b6ea-01db459c197f Thu, 22 Feb 2024 11:05:25 -0500 Study reveals unexpected link between cell membrane damage and cellular senescence
都柏林大学学院成立新的“同一个健康中心”以解决全球健康挑战都柏林大学学院 (UCD) 今天推出了新的同一个健康中心。该中心致力于推进“同一个健康”方法的研究、教育和合作，以解决全球健康挑战，该方法认识到人类、动物和地球健康的相互关联性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/University-College-Dublin-launches-new-Centre-for-One-Health-for-solving-global-health-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/University-College-Dublin-launches-new-Centre-for-One-Health-for-solving-global-health-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f4dd654-f77e-4c7d-b68e-cc6d47fe453a Thu, 22 Feb 2024 10:55:00 -0500 University College Dublin launches new Centre for One Health to solve global health challenges
神经细胞培养模型揭示神经退行性病变的复杂机制苏黎世大学的科学家开发了一种创新的神经细胞培养模型，揭示了神经退行性疾病背后的复杂机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Neural-cell-culture-model-sheds-light-on-the-intricate-mechanisms-underlying-neurodegenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Neural-cell-culture-model-sheds-light-on-the-intricate-mechanisms-underlying-neurodegenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1d2284f-db06-40b8-9ee6-91c498501cc7 Thu, 22 Feb 2024 10:43:16 -0500 Neural cell culture model sheds light on the intricate mechanisms underlying neurodegeneration
LabVantage Solutions 推出数字原生生态系统以实现研发成功LabVantage 解决方案提供减少冗余实验、改进实验设计、从数据中获取更深入见解以及自动化实验室工作流程的解决方案，帮助研发实验室取得创新成功。 LabVantage 引入了用于研发的数字原生生态系统，满足了研究人员在语义搜索、分析和自动化三大类方面的需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/LabVantage-Solutions-Introduces-Digital-Native-Ecosystem-for-RD-Success.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/LabVantage-Solutions-Introduces-Digital-Native-Ecosystem-for-RD-Success.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=feee9160-2fb9-490a-b10b-19090d4d338e Thu, 22 Feb 2024 10:26:00 -0500 LabVantage Solutions Introduces Digital Native Ecosystem for R&D Success
